name: Battlefield Heroes
description:
Battlefield Heroes is an action-shooter game developed by Electronic Arts Digital Illusions Creative Entertainment and EAsy Studios. It was originally released in 2009. Electronic Arts published the game. On review aggregator Metacritic, Battlefield Heroes has a score of 69. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Battlefield Heroes on PC.
developers: Electronic Arts Digital Illusions Creative Entertainment
